xlib_symbol.description: Register an object method to receive a timeout or interval event. On timeout the event listener will receive a reference to it's xTimerObj which has methods: start, stop, and reset; and properties: elapsed and data. xTimer is a global object created when x_timer.js is included. Multiple timers can be set.
